title: Fix release workflow: github-actions[bot] lacks permission to push tags
description:
## Problem
changesets/action@v1 fails with 403 error when pushing git tags after npm publish:
```
remote: Permission to 2digits-agency/configs.git denied to github-actions[bot].
fatal: unable to access 'https://github.com/2digits-agency/configs/': The requested URL returned error: 403
Error: The process '/usr/bin/git' failed with exit code 128
```

## Root Cause
In .github/workflows/release.yml line 12:
- Current: `contents: read`
- Needed: `contents: write`

## Fix
Change permissions block from:
```yaml
permissions:
  id-token: write
  contents: read
```

To:
```yaml
permissions:
  id-token: write
  contents: write
```

## References
- https://github.com/changesets/action/issues/387
- https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions/60392
